DOC.criteria: Male patient , age 18 50 year ; Body weight ≥ 50 kg BMI ≥ 18.5 kg/m2 ≤ 30 kg/m2 ; Healthy men accordance historical test ; Healthy subject laboratory result within normal range within parameter accept clinical protocol Negative result parasitological stool examination perform clinical study ; Subject research laboratory result within normal range urinalysis collect first visit ; Research subject allocate Group 6 endoscopy within normal range ; History gastrointestinal disease , hepatic , renal , cardiovascular , pulmonary , neurologic , hematologic , diabetes glaucoma ; Evidence clinical examination physical complement , organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normality ; History use psychotropic drug excessive alcohol consumption ( two unit alcohol per day , one unit equivalent one cup ( 200 mL ) brew dose ( 50 ) mL distil beverage ) difficulty abstain study ; Use medication two ( 2 ) week prior inclusion research subject study ; Regular smoker quit less one ( 1 ) year ; History food allergy hyperreactivity medication food ; HIV positive HIV ; Being positive Hepatitis B ; Being positive hepatitis C ; Testing positive Helicobacter pilorum ; Using substance modulate hepatic microsomal activity within thirty ( 30 ) day prior entry subject research clinical study ( date signing consent form ) ; Having donate blood ( blood volume high 500 mL ) within four ( 4 ) month precede date signing consent form ; Subject history hypersensitivity component investigational product ;
